DataElement.preferredName: Procedures Supplemental Qualifiers Dataset Performed Procedure Data Submission Yes No Indicator
DataElement.preferredDefinition: A Yes/No indicator that indicates if any performed procedures data is submitted.

DataElementConcept.preferredName: Procedures Supplemental Qualifiers Dataset Performed Procedure Data Submission
DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: A dataset containing supplemental information, specifically non-standard variables, to parent records in the procedures domain.:The completed activity whose immediate and primary intention is the alteration of the physical or mental condition of the subject, study subject or experimental unit._A collection or single item of factual information, derived from measurement or research, from which conclusions may be drawn._The act of referring for judgment or consideration by others; the act of handing over something.

ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: A dataset containing supplemental information, specifically non-standard variables, to parent records in the procedures domain.

Concepts.definition: A dataset containing supplemental information, specifically non-standard variables, to parent records in the procedures domain.

A collection or single item of factual information, derived from measurement or research, from which conclusions may be drawn.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: Tests, examinations, evaluations used to determine a subject's status or response to intervention.
ConceptualDomain.changeDescription: Created initially to support CCR value domain for CTMS.

ValueDomain.preferredDefinition: The preferred Value Domain to indicate a question with permissible values of yes/no.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: The non-affirmative response to a question.

Concepts.definition: The non-affirmative response to a question.

ValueMeaning.administrativeNotes: 2022.12.28 Alt VM added per ticket request CADSR0001837. aj

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: The affirmative response to a question.

Concepts.definition: The affirmative response to a question.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: Conceptual domain that includes value meanings to be used for Indicator Value Meanings such as Yes, No, Unknown, No Applicable

RepresentationTerm.preferredDefinition: A caDSR representation term that is used to indicate a question with permissible values of yes/no

Concepts.definition: A response or indicator that can have a value of either yes or no.
